thread.title: Polk County Ga. arrest report for October 22, 2015
thread.title_full: Polk County Ga. arrest report for October 22, 2015 | Examiner.com

author: Tammy Overstreet
title: Polk County Ga. arrest report for October 22, 2015
text:
Jason Anthony Billes, 37. of Rockmart was arrested and charged with possession of methamphetamine PCSO View all 13 photos The Northwest Georgia Crime Examiner personally compiles arrest reports that covers the Polk County area. These reports are for local news purposes only.
fbi.gov Listed below is the Polk County arrest report for Thursday October 22, 2015. The report includes a complete list of arrests, information regarding prior arrests, bonding information and available inmate photos. Unless specified otherwise, all information is obtained from the Polk County Sheriff's Office.
The following individuals were arrested and charged with the violations listed below. Click on the embedded links within each list to view the complete prior arrests report. Links to arrests prior to 2009 will not be included.
Jason Anthony Billes, 37. of Rockmart was arrested and charged with possession of methamphetamine.
Andrea Lashay Carter, 28, of Rome is currently housed at the Polk County jail for Chattooga County.
Buddy Oliver Carter, 67, of Cedartown was arrested and charged with theft by shoplifting. See also ( 5/4/2014 )
Veondi Breshaud Creamer, 22, of Rome was arrested and charged with driving while license suspended and passing in a no passing zone.
Robert Shane Hatch, 37, of Cedartown was arrested and charged with speeding, reckless driving and driving on wrong side of roadway.
Iva Nell Haynes, 66, of Summerville is currently housed at the Polk County jail for Chattooga County.
Joey Lee Morton, 42, of Rockmart was arrested and charged with driving while license suspended, no insurance and suspended registration.
Melissa Blythe Roberson, 38, of Silver Creek was arrested and charged with possession with intent. See also ( 3/14/2014 )
Mallory Denise Spencer, 31, of is currently house at the Polk County jail for Chattooga County.
Jason Lee Timms, 30, of was arrested and charged with possession with intent. See also ( 2/16/2015 )
Nessa L Washington, 41, of Cedartown was arrested on a bench warrant.
Joseph D Wilhoit, 23, of Calhoun was arrested and charged with theft by shoplifting. See also ( 5/11/2015 )
Harold Wayne Womack, 37, of Rockmart was arrested and charged with possession of meth, possession of tools used for the commission of crime and criminal attempt to commit a felony. See also ( 5/17/2014 )
The arrest reports within this list do not reflect the actual guilt or innocence of the individual or individuals listed. All parties are presumed innocent until they are proven guilty in a court of law. Not every arrest or charge leads to a conviction. A conviction or an acquittal will be determined by the court system.
